title.rendered: RHINO 3D EVOLUTION FRONT BAR SUIT LANDCRUISER 300 2022+

content.rendered:
3D EVOLUTION FRONT BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA LANDCRUISER 300 SERIES AVAILABLE NOW.

As flattering as copy bars are, our new design as always leaves them in our dust. Our amazing LandCruiser 300 series bars will be even more popular than our 200 series bar. We are well known for being the best bar in the market that adds that tough look without taking away from the original lines of the your vehicle. They are fully compatible with your sensors, radar and head light washers. We have also ensured the low mount radiators are well protected and have ample cooling with our additional integrated cooling vents.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat as standard with colour coding an option. It is a 3 and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The upper mid section comes standard in Black or can be optioned in stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights and recovery points which are an option on many other brands.

-The Landcruiser 3D Evolution bumper is compatible with front parking sensors and head lamp washers, and radar sensor. Just let us know if you have these at time of order to ensure you get the correct bar. We can provide infill plugs for vehicles that don’t require sensors or washers. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved and or sold. We do not require the grill or original bumper being kept or cut.

Includes:

  • Swing Away Number plate bracket
  • Hi-Lift Jacking Points
  • Standard with Winch mount
  • Integrated LED Fog lights
  • 5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate
  • 2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

  • Bar can be colour coded to your vehicle specification
  • upper mid can be optioned as stainless steel
  • Winch
  • Spotlight bar
  • Spotlights
  • Shackles
